The following questions describe several situations in which a person may encounter problems with memory, attention or concentration. If you are marking your own answers, please check the appropriate response based on your cognitive function during the past 4 weeks. Please answer every question. If you are not sure which answer to select, please choose the one answer that comes closest to describing you.

Miss appointments and meetings you had scheduled?
Have difficulty planning what to do in the day?

Forget what you did the night before?
Forget the date unless you looked it up?
Have trouble getting started, even if you had a lot of things to do?
